languages.english-overview:
PluXml Blog or CMS to Xml
No database : All data is stored in XML files. A simple file copy can move your site on a USB key, which makes it completely portable. Collaborative tool : 5 profiles with different levels of permissions. Family, friends, business, PluXml find its place.

ul.li: Multiple users with different authorization levels
Static pages, categories, tag management, archive
Rss Feed articles, comments, tags, categories
Translated into 11 languages (French, German, English, Spanish, Italian, Dutch, Occitan, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian)
Customizable themes (supports themes for smartphones and mobile devices: iphone, blackberry, pocket pc, ...)
